Thank You for Your Consultation Request

We've received your case details and appreciate the opportunity to assist with your economic analysis needs. Our team will review your submission and respond within 24 hours.

What Happens Next?

  1. Initial Review: We'll carefully review your case details and any specific requirements you've outlined.
  2. Response Within 24 Hours: You'll receive a preliminary assessment via email or phone, whichever you prefer.
  3. Free Consultation: We'll schedule a complimentary consultation to discuss your case in detail and outline potential approaches.
  4. Engagement Decision: After our discussion, you'll receive a clear proposal with timeline and fee structure - no obligation to proceed.

Need immediate assistance? Call us directly at (203) 605-2814 during business hours (8 AM - 6 PM ET).

Skerritt Economics & Consulting
